snippet: The veteran left-hander indicated after he pitched Monday that he was ready to join the Yankees. But the Yankees say they expect him to make at least one more minor league start.
abstract: The veteran left-hander indicated after he pitched Monday that he was ready to join the Yankees. But the Yankees say they expect him to make at least one more minor league start.

headline.main: Pettitte Ready to Return, but Yankees a Little More Cautious
